sent.orig: However, inside the loop there is a break statement that will break out of the loop.
sent.trans: 然而，循环内部有一个break语句，可中止循环。

sent.orig: Always code a break statement in the last case of a switch statement.
sent.trans: 在switch语句最后一个case中总是键入break语句。

sent.orig: This is the conventional way to build a switch statement, but the break is optional.
sent.trans: 这是构建switch语句的一种传统方式，但break是可选的。

sent.orig: Break, break, break On thy cold gray stones, O sea!
sent.trans: 撞击，撞击，撞击大海啊，在冰凉灰色的岩石上迸溅！

sent.orig: Break, break, break, At the foot of thy crags, O Sea!
